text: James Gordon Carr (October 11, 1951 â€“ December 12, 2022) was a Canadian politician. In the 2015 federal election, he was elected as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Winnipeg South Centre. He is the Minister of International Trade Diversification in the Cabinet of Canada, headed by Justin Trudeau. He was Minister of Natural Resources from 2015 to 2018.Full list of Justin Trudeau's Cabinet, CBC News. Retrieved on November 4, 2015. In October 2019, Carr was diagnosed with multiple myeloma. On December 12, 2022, Carr died from cancer at his home in Winnipeg. Carr was Jewish and had a bar mitzvah in 1964. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Canadian Jews Category:Cancer deaths in Canada Category:Deaths from multiple myeloma Category:Politicians from Winnipeg Category:Privy Councillors (Canada) Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada Category:University of British Columbia alumni
title: Jim Carr
